alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 11:10PM CDT until June 14 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sherman County in central Nebraska... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1110 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hazard, or 27 miles north of Kearney, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rockville around 1120 PM CDT. Loup City around 1125 PM CDT. Ashton and Sherman Reservoir Dam around 1130 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
